Package energy.usef.agr.workflow.step

Example AGE Workflow step.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgrControlActiveDemandSupplyStub
    Implementation of a workflow step to simulate the behavior of an Aggregator controlling Active Demands and Supplies.
    AgrCreateConnectionProfileStub
    This PBC is in charge of filling in the Profile values for each connection of the portfolio.
    AgrCreateNDayAheadForecastStub
    Implementation of a workflow step to simulate the behavior of the AGR Create N-Day-Ahead Forecasts.
    AgrCreateUdiStub
    This PBC is in charge of filling in the Profile values for each connection of the portfolio.
    AgrDetectDeviationFromPrognosesStub
    Implementation of a workflow step "AGRDetectDeviationFromPrognosis".
    AgrDetermineNetDemandsStub
    Workflow step implementation for the Workflow 'AGR Determine Net Demands'.
    AgrFlexOfferDetermineFlexibilityStub
    Implementation of a workflow step "AGRFlexOfferDetermineFlexibility".
    AgrIdentifyChangeInForecastStub
    Stub implementation of the PBC which is in charge of deciding whether the connection forecast is changed.
    AgrInitializeNonUdiClustersStub
    Stub implementation of the PBC which is in charge of initializing the Non-UDI cluster (eg PowerMatcher).
    AgrInitiateSettlementStub
    PBC stub implementation for the initiation of settlement for an Aggregator.
    AgrNonUdiCreateNDayAheadForecastStub
    Implementation of a workflow step to simulate the behavior of the AGR Create N-Day-Ahead Forecasts.
    AgrNonUdiDetectDeviationFromPrognosesStub
    Implementation of a workflow step "AGRNonUdiDetectDeviationFromPrognosis".
    AgrNonUdiReOptimizePortfolioStub
    A simple implementation of a workflow step to simulation the behavior of an Aggregator Re-optimize portfolio for non-udi aggregators.
    AgrNonUdiRetrieveAdsGoalRealizationStub
    Stub implementation of the PBC 'Retrieve ADS goal realization' PBC for a non-UDI aggregator.
    AgrNonUdiSetAdsGoalsStub
    Stub implementation of the PBC which is in charge of setting the ADS goals via the PowerMatcher.
    AgrReCreatePrognosesStub
    Stub implementation of the PBC which is in charge of deciding to re-create or not A-Plans and or D-Prognoses after the re-optimization of the portfolio.
    AgrReOptimizePortfolioStub
    A simple implementation of a workflow step to simulation the behavior of an Aggregator Re-optimize portfolio for udi aggregators.
    AgrReOptimizePortfolioStubUtil
    Util class with logic which can be reused by any PBC in charge of the 'Re-Optimize Portfolio' workflow.
    AgrUpdateElementDataStoreStub
    Implementation of a workflow step to simulate the behavior of the AGR Element Data Store Update.
    AgrValidateSettlementItemsStub
    Stub implementation of a the PBC handling received FlexOrderSettlementDto.

Package energy.usef.agr.workflow.step Description

Example AGE Workflow step.
